title: GET_HUD_COMPONENT_ALIGN
content:
0xCD949E20// GetHudComponentAlign
void GET_HUD_COMPONENT_ALIGN(int id, int* horizontalAlign, int* verticalAlign);Parameters:id: The hud component id.horizontalAlign: verticalAlign: See SET_SCRIPT_GFX_ALIGN for details about how gfx align works.
